title: Plz fix Mal.
body:
I mean, the guy is simply too strong. His shield negates all damage and spells. His Ult stuns and hurts like a bitch, his Q can silence, and he has a way to strong of a wave clear with his two other abilities. Even Kat, Ryse, Quinn, Kar, Syndar, Ziggs, and Kas has a hard time defeating this mage. I am most surprised by Kas and Quinn having a hard time against him. 
Lowering his numbers would do him some good because I have had too many Mal mains BMing because they can dominate my team, even when I am fed and tryharding.
I have only won my games because I was completely tryharding the shit out of the games. I want to have fun in draft games and not have to try hard to make the game fair for me and my team. I am also seeing Mal players to frequently because of SSG winning in the worlds. Plz Riot, just nerf him to the ground for a while so he can drop in popularity, then give him a small buff to get him back in meta so he is somewhat reliable again. Right now I am seeing him too often and he always does the most damage even when far behind.
